fields.name: The Law Knows No Kindness (C1)
fields.value: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

fields.name: Right of Final Interpretation (C2)
fields.value: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

fields.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Signed Edict by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Supreme Amnesty (C4)
fields.value:
When Done Deal is used:
Creates a shield which absorbes upto 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s. This shield absorbes Pyro DMG 250% more efficiently.

fields.name: Abiding Affidavit (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Done Deal by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Extra Clause (C6)
fields.value: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.
